sentences.sContent: The manager of that theatre created a dangerous situation by allowing people to overcrowd the balcony.
sentences.sContent_eng: The manager of that theatre created a dangerous situation by allowing people to overcrowd the balcony.
sentences.sCn: 那家剧场的经理让过多的人拥挤在楼厅里，造成了一种危险的情形。

words.tran: 过度指摘的；吹毛求疵的
超速档；[机] 超速传动
穿得过分讲究；穿得过多
驱使过度；虐待；工作过度
过度装饰；使穿著过分讲究

trans.tranOther: to fill (a room, vehicle, city, etc) with more people or things than is desirable
